projects.longName: General (Applies to projects in time period)
objective: Enhance and maintain internal media tracking tool
responsibilities: Provide software design advice to company leadership
Design and implement new features as needed
Identify risks and suggest solutions for all development efforts
Improve team code quality by setting standards for unit testing and building our code
achievements: Established unit test standards and guidelines for team members, provided ongoing instruction and guidance
Quickly became in house expert on spring integration which was the core of our legacy application
Identified inefficiencies in our software development processes and recommended several improvements
Implemented multiple client and analyst facing features leveraging multiple spring libraries minimizing technical debt
